snippet.title: Mahjong Soul Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
The animated trailer for Mahjong Soul, produced by Yostar Pictures. 

Please continue to enjoy the fun of mahjong with old & new friends in Mahjong Soul Shrine, Jyanshi Sama!

For the latest on all things Mahjong Soul! Find us here: 

Mahjong Soul Official Homepage: 
https://mahjongsoul.yo-star.com/#/ 

Official Discord: 
https://discord.gg/mahjongsoul 

Official Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/MahjongSoul_EN 

Official Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/MahjongSoulEN 

#MahjongSoul #Yostar
